OFFER LETTER


Date: {{frappe.format_date(doc.offer_date, "dd-MM-yyyy")}}


Dear {{doc.applicant_name}}


{% set applicant_detail = frappe.get_doc("Job Applicant", doc.applicant) %} {% set ns = namespace(report_on='') %} {% for offer_term in doc.offer_terms %} {% if offer_term.offer_term == 'Report On' %} {% set ns.report_on = offer_term.value %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} This is with reference to your application & subsequent interviews you had with us, we are pleased to offer you the position of {{doc.designation}} in {{applicant_detail.custom_department}} department with our organization. You are advised to join us on {%if doc.custom_expected_date_of_joining %} {{frappe.format_date(doc.custom_expected_date_of_joining,"dd-MM-yyyy")}}{%endif%}.


The terms & conditions of your employment will be specified in your letter of appointment. On the day of your joining you are required to submit the documents mentioned in Annexure A.


You are requested to report on or before at {%if doc.custom_expected_date_of_joining %} {{frappe.format_date(doc.custom_expected_date_of_joining,"dd-MM-yyyy")}}{%endif%}. In case you fail to report on this date unless otherwise agreed in written the offer shall stand automatically withdrawn.


If on verification, at the time of appointment or at a later date it is found that you have furnished wrong information, in such cases your services with the company will be liable to termination.


We welcome you to {{ doc.company.split(' ')[0] }} Family and to a beginning of a long and mutually beneficial association.


With Best Wishes,


For, {{doc.company}}.
